text.html: Buy Now Pay Later - New In

paragraph.html:
Hello [Customer Name]! 

Unlock the ultimate convenience with our Buy Now, Pay Later option! We're here to remind you of this fantastic feature, designed to give you the financial flexibility you deserve while shopping for all your business needs. This payment method ensures you can stock up on essentials or explore new products without immediate financial pressure.

Also, get ready to be amazed by our latest product arrivals! Explore these exciting additions and discover how they can transform your operations and boost your success.

More info below :) 
Have a lovely rest of the day
Rodrigo and AW Team

Have you heard about the new payment method in our store? The PastPay Buy Now Pay Later payment method is available to our corporate clients from Great Britain with valid Company Registration number. 

Please note: The Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) payment option is available only to customers with a valid company number. To ensure BNPL functionality, make sure your profile account includes a valid and updated company registration number. The BNPL option will be displayed at checkout.

Boost your retail offerings with line of Home Fresh Room Sprays, designed to bring a touch of nature's finest scents into every home. Ancient Wisdom Room Sprays are crafted with the highest quality ingredients, ensuring a superior product that your customers will love. Perfect for boutique stores, Home Decor Shops., Fragrance Shops, Gift Shops.

image.alt: Chakra Bath Salt - Gift Pack of 7

paragraph.html:
Unleash the power of self-discovery with these exquisite collection of aromatherapy Chakra Bath Salt Vials, designed to balance and harmonize the body's energy centres.

This exclusive collection features seven distinct bath salts, each tailored to a specific chakra. Made from from high quality essential oils.

Embrace the timeless beauty of Southeast Asian artistry with our collection of Wholesale Vintage Hand-Carved Buddha Statues. Each statue, meticulously crafted by skilled artisans in Indonesia, tells a story through its intricate carvings and artfully aged appearance.

A must have in your shop or website, Ancient Wisdom's captivating Palo Santo Heaters. Handcrafted from premium teak wood in Indonesia, these heaters boast sleek shapes (rectangular, square, or teardrop) and come in eight stunning designs featuring symbols like the Hamsa, Mandala, and Tree of Life. Each adds a touch of spiritual elegance to any space.

Immerse yourself in the beauty of the sea with our captivating collection of Wholesale Boho Seashell Lamps. Handcrafted in Indonesia by skilled artisans, these unique lamps bring a touch of coastal flair and bohemian style to any space.

In today's design landscape, home décor trends lean towards mindfulness and Zen-inspired spaces. Expand your product portfolio and cater to this growing customer segment with our captivating selection of Wholesale Home Decoration Buddha Heads. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Indonesia, these unique pieces are a guaranteed conversation starter and will draw in customers seeking spiritual or cultural accents for their homes.

Ultimate Spa Experience Starter: Everything You Need for a Relaxing Retail Oasis. This Starter provides everything you need to create a stunning spa product display and stock it with top-selling bath treats. 

You will get 1x Standard Four Shelf Stand & Cupboard, 48x Zen Shower Steamer 50g, 32x Bath Bombs, 6x Glass Jars, 4x Floral Bath Soak, 12x Heart Bath Bomb Gift Sets, 12x Chakra Bath Fizz + 2x FREE Display Tray worth £19.95  

The retail value of all products included is £470.10
